thoughts: Is carefully checking the nursery for thorns
Wonders if being a warrior would have been more fun
Is studying herbs that help during kitting
Is trying to gently correct a Clanmate who is very wrong about something
Pressed against a cat who looked like {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} needed a bit of support
Had to fix an argument between the kits... again
Is telling r_c a fantastical story
Makes sure r_c doesn't sneak out of the nursery again!
